job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstronguHelp Create the Future of Our Worlds BuildingsustrongppbrppbrppstrongABOUT ONBOARDnbspstrongppThe real estate industrys lack of data interoperability remains a persistent bottleneck to widespread adoption of intelligent building software Software developers data scientists and analysts use Onboards software to eliminate this barrier and quickly acquire data for their smart building applications Its our mission to provide easy access to building data and power the future of digital building services Onboards innovative platform uses machine learning and deep learning to rapidly classify and integrate various data streams enabling data usecases across energy efficiency tenant comfort security maintenance among othersnbspppOnboard is a bootstrapped business headquartered in Somerville MA and is the recipient of several awards from the US Department of Energy Massachusetts Clean Energy Center and Accel VT Onboard was founded in 2018 and the founding team has experience from seed stage to acquisition across hardware and software productsnbspnbspppbrppstrongABOUT THE ROLEstrongppIn your first week you can expect to develop and deploy a scraper to compile data from the web In your first month you will employ machine learning techniques to extract data from documents and refine our existing machine learning products In your first year you will implement evaluate and productize deep learning models from a variety of IoT data sources and contribute to technical literature and intellectual property reportingnbspppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliExamples of prior success achievements or work products in the field of ML and AInbspliliExperience with deep learning frameworks such as Keras PyTorch TensorFlow Theano MXNetnbspliliProficient with Python R and data visualization toolsnbspliliA collaborative team member who is comfortable with ambiguity and eager to contribute beyond their expertise in other areas of the businessnbspliliA selfdirected researcher who can independently develop hypotheses design experiments set and meet milestones evaluate results and clearly communicate outcomes to a diverse teamnbspliliAn MS or PHD in Computer Science Engineering Applied Mathematics or PhysicsnbspliulpbrppstrongCompensation and WellnessstrongpulliRanges 100000  120000  1  2 stock option plannbspliliHealth insurance 401K retirement plannbsplili4 weeks paid time off up to 24 hours paid time off for volunteeringnbspliliGreentown coworking office and remote work capablenbspliulpbrppstrongINTERVIEW PROCESSstrongppbrpulliEmail your resume to careersonboarddataiolili20 minute phone screenlili60 minute cultural Zoom fit InterviewliliCompensated takehome programming challengenbsplili90 minute Technical amp Design Zoom InterviewnbspliliWe ask for two references which can be provided at any timenbspliulpbrppWe Look Forward to Hearing from Youp
